title: Rear Suspension Units - Removal

body.body: Before starting work, ensure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported. This will help prevent it from falling and causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Raise and support the motorcycle so that the rear wheel is clear of the ground.
If both suspension units are to be removed, place a block beneath the rear wheel to prevent it dropping when the second unit is removed.
Loosen and remove the upper and lower mounting bolts and washers then remove the suspension unit from its mounting spigots. Discard the bolts.
Repeat step 2 for the other rear suspension unit (if required).
